---
name: New project report
about: Request a new project page
title: 'Add project: '
labels: ''
assignees: [copilot]

---

Fill in your project data here, and the AI agent will generate a page. See examples on the site.

**Title**
The formal title of your project.

**Students**
Full names.

**Mentors**
Full names.

**Term**
Fall 2025

**Type (choose one)**
- [ ] Thesis project
- [ ] Term project
- [ ] Management course project

**Picture**
A screenshot or a diagram that illustrates your project. If possible, use a large picture (1424px+ wide).

**Problem**
In 1-3 paragraphs, describe the problem that your project was solving.

**Report**
Describe the solution in several paragraphs. You may use pictures, LaTeX formulas, and code snippets.
